author: Reuters Editorial
title: Peru's Credicorp Q1 net profit jumps 16.7 pct vs year ago
text:
LIMA, May 3 (Reuters) - Peruâ€™s largest financial holding company, Credicorp Ltd, earned 1.037 billion soles ($317 million) in net profit in the first quarter, up 16.7 percent from the same period a year earlier, the company said on Thursday.
Credicorp said its average daily loan balances expanded by 7 percent in the first quarter year-on-year, reflecting a gradual recovery in loan growth, and that it has improved the risk quality of its loan portfolio.
$1=3.272 Reporting By Mitra Taj, Editing by Rosalba O'Brien
